meanings.definition: To formulate a new theory or set of theories.
meanings.sent1: She retheorized her ideas after reading a new book.
meanings.sent2: The scientist retheorized the experiment to include recent data.
meanings.sent3: He retheorized his approach to gardening and planted the flowers upside down!
meanings.sent4: The teacher retheorized the lesson plan, turning it into a fun game for the students.
meanings.sent5: The chef retheorized the recipe, adding a surprising twist with cinnamon.

meanings.definition: To reconsider or revise a theory.
meanings.sent1: After feedback, she retheorized her hypothesis for the science fair.
meanings.sent2: The team retheorized their strategy for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: He retheorized his decision to wear shorts in the snow and quickly changed into pants.
meanings.sent4: The author retheorized the plot of the story, creating a shocking twist at the end.
meanings.sent5: The artist retheorized the painting, adding vibrant colors to make it more appealing.
